column1: Kata Robata////If you're wanting to try this place for its signature dishes its worth trying once. If you're coming for their rolls
column2: don't waste your time or your money. There are better places in Houston for sushi
column3: and cheaper too. There's no need to name drop
column4: for those familiar with sushi you know where the best places are. For those of you not familiar
column5: kata is like your baby step
column6: you can try it but its not the end all be all of sushi in Houston. You'll find out there are better spots that are worth your time and money
column7: and if you're not sure ask around.
